Based on the preferences you've mentioned, I would highly recommend "The Andromeda Strain" (1971).

The movie is a science fiction classic that explores the consequences of a deadly extraterrestrial organism (XENOBEAST) falling to Earth. 

The movie features top scientists working feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what killed the citizens of a small town and how the deadly contagion can be stopped.

The movie stars top actors such as David Wayne, Jason Mantzoukas, and Aasif Mandvi, who all deliver outstanding performances that keep audiences on the edge of their seats.

In conclusion, "The Andromeda Strain" (1971) is an incredible science fiction classic that explores the consequences of a deadly extraterrestrial organism falling to Earth.
